Submit Your Abstract

Required: Please prepare a PDF abstract (max 300 words).

Your abstract should address:

  • Relation to conference themes
  • Top insights/messages
  • Engagement format (presentation/workshop)

To submit, please email your PDF to:

abstracts@metaphorum2026.org

Subject line: "Abstract Submission - [Your Name]"
